data.title: SEVENTEEN EXHIBITION ‘FOLLOW FELLOW’ in Bangkok
data.description:
A Record of SEVENTEEN FOLLOW


Concert Preparation


Similar to how diamonds attain their luster through time and pressure, SEVENTEEN has devoted an immense amount of effort to crystallize a single moment of brilliance on stage. Prior to showcasing their flawlessly timed performance that unites 13 members into a harmonious whole, SEVENTEEN underwent a meticulous polishing process that could only be described as top-notch teamwork in action.


We invite you to experience the emotions of the concert and the messages conveyed by the members during this exhibition, as we follow the trails of SEVENTEEN’s unwavering dedication and intensive practice.


The exhibition ticket can also be purchased on-site, but those who have reserved and purchased the tickets online will be given priority for entry. There may be a delay in on-site purchasing depending on on-site circumstances. We ask for your understanding.



Exhibition Information


TITLE: SEVENTEEN EXHIBITION ‘FOLLOW FELLOW’ IN BANGKOK
  • WHEN: From Sun, Sep 15 to Tue, Oct 15, 2024
  • WHERE: ICONSIAM Art Space, 8th floor, 299 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khlong Ton Sai, Khlong San, Bangkok 10600, Thailand
  • VIP: 2,500 THB - (1 Entry Ticket + 13 Phototicket of each members / Limited quantity)
  • GENERAL ADMISSION: 1,100 THB - (1 Entry Ticket + 1 Random Phototicket)



    • Viewing Information


    Weekdays

    1st Show: 10:30 – 11:30 / 2nd Show: 11:30 – 12:30 / 3rd Show: 12:30 – 13:30

    4th Show: 13:30 – 14:30 / 5th Show: 14:30 – 15:30 / 6th Show: 15:30 – 16:30

    7th Show: 16:30 – 17:30 / 8th Show: 17:30 – 18:30 / 9th Show: 18:30 – 19:30

    10th Show: 19:30 – 20:30


    Weekends

    1st : 10:20 / 2nd : 10:40 / 3rd : 11:00 / 4th : 11:20 / 5th : 11:40 / 6th : 12:00

    7th : 12:20 / 8th : 12:40 / 9th : 13:00 / 10th : 13:20 / 11th : 13:40 / 12th : 14:00

    13th : 14:20 / 14th : 14:40 / 15th : 15:00 / 16th : 15:20 / 17th : 15:40 / 18th : 16:00

    19th : 16:20 / 20th : 16:40 / 21st : 17:00 / 22nd : 17:20 / 23rd : 17:40 / 24th : 18:00

    25th : 18:20 / 26th : 18:40 / 27th : 19:00 / 28th : 19:20 / 29th : 19:40 / 30th : 20:00



    Reservation Information


    Starting from 21 August 2024 (17:00)

  • Ticket Purchase Limit: 1 purchase per person, up to 5 tickets.
  • Please claim your ticket at the ticket booth on the day of your reservation after verifying your identity and reservation information.
  • Tickets cannot be refunded or amended.
  • Any other regulations regarding ticket reservations will follow those of the ticketing outlets.



    • Viewing Guidelines


  • The official viewing time is 60 minutes, and 30 minutes for visiting the shop. Please enjoy the exhibition and visit the shop in compliance with the designated route in the exhibition.
  • You may be denied entry and viewing if you are over 30 minutes late to your reserved time slot.
  • Viewing date and time may change depending on on-site circumstances. Please make sure to check the information on the reservation page.
  • Other than your mobile phone, all cameras, such as DSLR cameras or camcorders, cannot be carried inside the exhibition.
  • Photographing using a flash, tripod, or selfie stick and photographing or recording audio or videos for commercial purposes are prohibited. You can take photos using your mobile phone only in the specified areas, separately instructed during the viewing.
  • Maintain your distance to prevent damage to the exhibits.
  • Smoking is not allowed inside the exhibition.
  • In this exhibition, all payments can only be made by credit card, debit card and PromptPay. Cash payment is not accepted. We ask for your understanding.
  • You may be asked for an identity verification before your entrance to the exhibition.
  • Please bring a valid form of ID with you.
  • You can only enter during the time slot you have reserved. Entry will be denied at any other time slots. Please keep the time-slot-based viewing system in mind and make sure to come on time.
  • You can view the exhibition only in the specified order. No viewing in the opposite order or re-entry once you leave.



    • Important Purchase Information


  • Any transfer, purchase by proxy, forgery, or other unauthorized actions through any channel other than the officially designated ticket retailer are strictly prohibited.
  • Using abnormal or fraudulent methods (ex: using a macro program, etc.) or purchasing a ticket for the purpose of scalping, or any other unauthorized activities or attempts to do so may lead to your ticket reservation being canceled or restricted from use without any prior notice.
  • The event organizers will not be held responsible for or mitigate any issues caused by failing to adhere to the guided cautions. Please be careful of any scams.
data.location: ICON Art & Culture Space, 8th floor, ICONSIAM 299 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khlong Ton Sai, Khlong San, Bangkok 10600, Thailand
